bug.short_desc: Build script broken: Unexpected token var

long_desc.thetext:
(In reply to comment #1) > I'm sorry, but is no need to removing the semicolon before } else. > The problem was solved just wrap the two for() loops in curly braces. > I think my browser had refreshing problem (maybe didn't clean up the cache).
Ok, but you also shouldn't need to use the curly braces for the for() loops. It's good that you can go on working, but it's just a work-around. We need to look into this.
Move open issues to RESOLVED â€“ LATER, whose last comment is older than a year.
